name: MILEU
description:
Mileu is a Vertical Slice, Puzzle, Adventure game where you the player swap between a boy and his pet cat to complete puzzles and topple the elites!

The Setting:

Mileu is set in a dystopian 1920s france, post WW1 where AI was used to cause a tech advancement that caused issues for the people around and there livelihoods.

The cat:
In Mileu you play as a Cat (We refer to him as Arthur) who is able to talk to the player in English, With this the Cat describes and helps the player though a level (navi style) , but when playing the Cat you become a useful asset, use the Cat the seek through Ventilation networks to access different rooms, throw the Cat into locations out of the boys reach!, be sneaking and distracting to the guards...

The Boy:

Our protagonist in Mileu is a Boy, (the name is all yours) who is capable of reading a situation at hand and has suffered from the post WW1 AI overtake in society, his roll is to help the cat into different places, Collect items worth value and use weaponry to his advantage on these AI robots around the world.

The Controls:

THIS GAME USES XBOX CONTROLLERS, PLEASE USE AN XINPUT DEVICE.

Press Y to Swap between the player & the Cat.

Press X to Interact with Objects.

Use the LT & RT + RS to Throw the Cat and aim where it lands using the trail.

Use LS to Move and RS to Move Camera.

How to Download:

Download the game files and extract them into a separate folder then Run the EXE named MILEU.
